name: JMD Web Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
description:
JMD WEB SOLUTION (P) LTD. is a global software development and outsourcing service provider from India, established to provide 360-degree customer requirements in the most promising areas of Information Technology ( IT ) and Digital Media solutions today.
Our offerings (both in onshore and offshore models) include offshore software development, custom application development, application maintenance & service supports, web design & development, custom software development. We've been around for quite some time, and we are still growing! It's our pleasure to be your first choice.
Our main motto is to help you through our maximum services. We provide complete IT services; we are a single point of contact for all your IT-related solutions and needs. JMD Web Solution (P) Ltd. always provides innovative and creative works that fulfill all required IT support & services as well as computer & server repairs and sales.
